definition: A characteristic of an entity type about which the organisation wishes to hold information.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Distinguishes entity type. Is specified by its name, definition, classification and format.

definition: Distinguishing feature.
The way in which a dataset is made up.
Unit of knowledge created by a unique combination of characteristics.
A set of concepts structured according to the relations among them.
A representation of facts, concepts, or instructions in a formalized manner, suitable for communication, interpretation, or processing by humans or by automatic means. (ISO 2382-4).
A classification of data according to the purpose for which it is used.
A form by which data is structured and organised in an information system.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Has associated dimensions

definition: Data stored on a computer as one unit with one name.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Is part of a dataset.

definition: One occurrence of an attribute.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Contains data value.

definition: Metadata that identifies the sources of data and the transformations through which is has passed up to the point of consumption.
A series of data that repeats in a recognizable way.
Data quality is the degree to which dimensions of data meet requirements.
The value of a data item.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Is contained in data item. Forms part of record. Is within value domain. Represents a property of an object.

definition: Any organized collection of data.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Is composed of data files.

definition: The degree to which a dataset can be consulted or retrieved by data consumers or processes.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Is a characteristic of a dataset.

definition: The way in which a dataset is made up.
Representation of a concept by an expression that describes it and differentiates it from related concepts.
Measurable characteristic.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Is associated with a data concept.

definition: A thing of significance about which the organisation wishes to hold information.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Is distinguished by attributes. Describes object.

definition: A combination of datatype, unit of measure and character set.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Is part of the specification of an attribute.

definition: A provisional data value that will be updated by a more accurate value.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Is a specification of a data value.

definition: Data held by an organization which describe object types that it needs to reference in order to perform its transactions.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Is an instance of data category.

definition: Data that defines and describes other data.
Anything perceivable or conceivable.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Is described by entity type. Is characterised by properties. Is represented by records.

definition: A feature of an object.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Characterises object. Is recorded by data value. Actually, has real value.

definition: The real-life value of a property of an object.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Expresses an instance of a property.

definition: A logically related set of data values that represent a (real-world) object.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Forms part of data file. Is composed of data values.

definition: Data used to categorize other data.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Is an instance of data category.

definition: A dataset designated by the government in which vital data about citizens, residents, companies, institutions, vehicles, topography, buildings, and addresses can be centrally maintained.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Is an instance of data category.

definition: Output from a statistical process.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Is an instance of data category.

definition: Data that describes an event that takes place as an organization conducts its business.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Is an instance of data category.

definition: A set of permissible values of an attribute.
relationshipsWithOtherConcepts: Includes data value.
